project: Intelligent Data Quality Monitoring for Regulatory Reporting
description: Configuration for rule-based data quality checks and ML thresholds inspired by PRA, ECB and EBA guidelines

operational_notes.threshold_definition: Numeric thresholds are proxy values derived from industry best practices. Regulators do not prescribe fixed thresholds.
regulatory_alignment: ECB guidance on data quality and ML usage
operational_notes.data_privacy: All datasets used are synthetic and anonymized for academic purposes
